Lae'zel Tips and Notes

First Blood of the Absolute buildShe is dressed to be a shock troop for this build. She softens the enemy and can take hits. Use her Shield of Faith and her Color Spray every fight you can. (Unless you only use Absolute's Warboard and only have the Shield of Faith 1/short rest.) Helmet (metal) Githyanki Half Plate Gloves of Power (Branded) Metalli
